headline: Stocks Soar as Middle East Tensions Ease and Bond Yields Fall
summary: The S&P 500 Index ($SPX ) (SPY ) Tuesday closed up +1.11%, the Dow Jones Industrials Index ($DOWI ) (DIA ) closed up +1.19%, and the Nasdaq 100 Index ($IUXX ) (QQQ ) closed up +1.53%. September E-mini S&P futures (ESU25 ) are up +1.11%, and September E-mini Nasdaq futures...

headline: Microchip Enhances TrustMANAGER Platform to Support CRA Compliance and Cybersecurity Regulations
summary: Firmware over-the-air updates and remote cryptographic key management provide scalable solutions for addressing IoT security challengesCHANDLER, Ariz., June 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- International cybersecurity regulations continue to adapt to meet the evolving threat landscape. One major focus is on outdated firmware in IoT devices, which can present significant security vulnerabilities. To address these challenges, Microchip Technology (Nasdaq: MCHP) is enhancing its TrustMANAGER platform t

headline: Calamos Phineus Long/Short Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Calamos Phineus Long/Short Fund rose 0.93% in Q1 (Class I shares at NAV), compared with a price decline of -4.27% for the S&P 500 Index and loss of -2.15% for the MSCI World Index.
